column1: Master of Science (MS) in Cyber Analytics
column5: Earn a master’s degree in cyber analytics, learn how to interpret data to fight cybercrimeThe M.S. in Cyber Analytics program builds upon students' understanding of the basic concepts of analytics as it relates to cybersecurity and prepares students to further their careers protecting customer data and defending the nation’s critical infrastructure from cybercriminals and nation states alike.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
